Simpler tool that freedom your work way.

Build your own workspace to replace isolated tools and bring everyone together.

Tools erect walls

Collaboration is a struggle, when everybody uses a different app.We have the solution for that.

Build your own workspace.

It will take a couple of hours, but will save your company weeks in the long term.

  • Create

    Easy-to-use apps for each team with no code

  • Organize

    Work into custom hierarchies, fields and formulas

  • Visualize

    Workflows with Tables, Boards, Timelines, Charts & more.

Bring all the roles together .

We believe in autonomous teams that own their work and their piece of workspace.

Align

ideas and knowledge with real-time collaborative wiki.

Link

Visually by building roadmaps that are always up-to-date.

Decentralize

Smoothly when everybody knows what's important.

Focus on meaningfull work.

Your workspace naturally maps the way you work, so there is nothing to be distracted by.
